english.segment1: My mind isn't quite sure. What it has bargained for. But my heart is in time with. With the consistent beat.
english.segment2: This dream is sneaking up on me. No matter how collected I seem to be. Is anybody ever truly complete?. Or are the better ones just better at believing?
english.segment3: So I'll go and say you're with me. I know it's just the beginning.
english.segment4: At times I feel cold and exposed under a microscope. But it has never much better to live. It doesn't matter if all my friends latch on to this. There's only one acceptance that's not later dismissed.
english.segment5: Just go and say you're with me. I know it's just the beginning.
english.segment6: My mind isn't quite sure. What it has bargained for. But my heart is in time with, With the consistent beat of yours.
english.segment7: I'm not looking to music to complete me. I'm not looking for a new philosophy. I'm not waiting for somebody to swoon me. I'm just searching for a better way into your love.
english.segment8: Can you feel the only eyes that see inside?. Can you feel anything anymore?
